ISSUE.TITLE: label length vs kubernetes
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION:
### Discussed in https://github.com/containers/podman/discussions/13901
Originally posted by **nivekuil** April 17, 2022 Podman labels don't have the tight constraints (63 chars) that k8s labels do. Is this intended? It's handy to rely on this to filter for pods with a certain label key through the API, which is not possible with annotations (the k8s compatible way).

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #14009 from vrothberg/add-benchmarks benchmarks: add more image benchmarks

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Truncate annotations when generating kubernetes yaml files Kubernetes only allows 63 characters in an annotation. Make sure that we only add 63 or less charaters when generating kube. Warn if containers or pods have longer length and truncate.
